name: Last.fm Now Playing
description: Display what's currently playing via Last.fm scrobbling. Works with Apple Music, Spotify, and any scrobbling source.
author: FiestaBoard

username.title: Last.fm Username
username.description: Your Last.fm username (from your profile URL: last.fm/user/USERNAME)

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Your Last.fm API key (get one free at last.fm/api/account/create)

refresh_seconds.title: Refresh Interval (seconds)
refresh_seconds.description: How often to check for now playing updates. Lower values = more real-time but more API calls.

show_album.title: Show Album Name
show_album.description: Include album name in the formatted output

env_vars.name: LASTFM_USERNAME
env_vars.description: Last.fm username (can also be set in UI)

env_vars.name: LASTFM_API_KEY
env_vars.description: Last.fm API key (can also be set in UI)
